summary: This mod makes Delphine walk to and from Kynesgrove instead of running. She will also walk escorting Esbern to Karthspire. Use it with a mod improving movement speed or download optional plugin with my settings.
descriptionHtml:
This simple mod aims to add some more realism by making Delphine walk instead of running when escorting player and Esbern (because who in real life runs everywhere all the time?). She will walk to and from Kynesgrove (no matter if you decide to go with her or not) and walk escorting Esbern to Karthspire.

I know, I know, walking speed in vanilla Skyrim is super slow, that's why I HIGHLY RECOMMEND using this mod along with some mod that improves movement speed. If you don't have one, or don't want to have so many plugins in your load order I added optional plugin with my setting.

Should be compatible with anything (I don't think any mod changes Delphine's packeges during "A Blade in the Dark" or "Alduin's Wall")

Enjoy!
author: dailyplanet

files.name: Wait up Delphine Walking speed change
